Ayyo Wars

An open and hackable 2D space battle game.

Play Demo

Ayyo Wars

Join the battle!

Factions battle to control our galaxy. Do you have what it takes to help us fight? We are a community built open-source video game that blurs the line between Programmer and Gamer. A homage to retro gaming. The next generation's Minecraft.

Connect with Github

Ayyo Wars is open-source and developed on Github. Come join the community conversation on Gitter Chat.

Ancient Alien Lore

We know Aliens. We even have some Alien friends. Ayyo Wars is built in a non-fictional universe where Aliens are very real. Don't get eaten by a Repitilian!

Online Multiplayer Battles

Using client-side prediction and low-latency servers, players battle each other in outer space. Features encrypted voice and video channels. Get your headsets on and your squad ready.

Explore The Known Galaxy

Using an accurate star map, Ayyo Wars let's players explore actual outer space. You might even learn something along the way!

Epic Local Play

No internet connection required. Multiple controllers supported. Endless gameplay. Play at home with your friends or one of our Artifical Intelligences.
